moves.name: Thunderbolt
moves.effect: Has a chance (10%) of leaving the target paralyzed.

moves.name: X Speed
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Speed by 2 stat ranks.

moves.name: Keep it Up!
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Speed by 2 stat ranks. Applies the Gradual Healing effect to the user.

moves.name: Electroweb
moves.effect: Lowers the target’s Speed by 1 stat rank.

passives.name: Lithe
passives.description: Prevents the user from getting paralyzed.

passives.name: Stamina Reserves 2
passives.description: Charges the user’s move gauge by 2 the first time it is in a pinch each battle.

passives.name: Hunter’s Instinct
passives.description: The more the target’s Speed is lowered, the more it powers up the user’s moves.
